step_feedback.feedback: Your arm was mostly straight overhead, but there was some slight bending at the elbow. Try to extend it fully to feel the resistance.
You made a good fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Keep up the strong effort!
You opened your hand and relaxed your muscles while exhaling. Remember to visualize the fluid moving out.
Your hand opening and muscle relaxation during exhalation were good. Continue to focus on this for effective fluid pumping.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the overhead pumping exercise. Remember to keep your arm fully extended overhead and focus on making a tight fist as you inhale, then opening your hand as you exhale to help move fluid.
